description:
Nova is unable to launch multiple instances from a single volume snapshot.

POST to Create Server API to boot from snapshot by passing snapshot_id in block_device_mapping
and set max_count >1
 
Expected result:
A volume should be created for each instance, and the instance should boot from the corresponding volume

Actual result:
Only one instance boots from the volume succesfully.
The other volume creation requests fail and the volumes fall into ERROR state. The remaining instances
also get stuck in ERROR status.

c-vol log snip: http://paste.openstack.org/show/28319/
n-cpu log snip:  http://paste.openstack.org/show/28320/
title: Unable to launch multiple instances using Boot From Snapshot
